A simple page linking to things related to ConGen2017.

## Important links from Eric's First Presentation

- [whoa_hands_on.nb.html](whoa_hands_on.nb.html) An R notebook to walk everyone through the
hands-on session using the R package `whoa`.
- [bayes-mcmc-gtyperr-narrative.nb.html](bayes-mcmc-gtyperr-narrative.nb.html). An R-notebook (in its
HTML incarnation) of Eric's narrative notes for his first presentation.



## Important links from Eric's Second Presentation
- [con-gen-2018 GitHub Repository](https://github.com/eriqande/con-gen-2017).  This would be the
thing to clone if you wanted to reproduce
